title: Iestyn Harris (rugby union)
text:
Iestyn Harris (born 24 November 1998) is a Welsh <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player, currently playing for <a href="Pro14">Pro14</a> side <a href="Cardiff%20Blues">Cardiff Blues</a>. His preferred position is <a href="Hooker%20%28rugby%20union%29">hooker</a>.
Cardiff Blues.
Harris signed his first professional contract for Cardiff Blues in September 2020.<ref name="Cardiff Blues 2020/21 squad"></ref> He made his Cardiff Blues debut in Round 7 of the <a href="2020%E2%80%9321%20Pro14">2020–21 Pro14</a> against <a href="Leinster%20Rugby">Leinster</a>.
